name: Escape The Simulation (UPS407)
description:
Escape the Simulation is a top down action adventure game where the player must fight their way through waves of enemies to solve complex puzzles and riddles in order to escape. You play as a rogue piece of data that should have been deleted but somehow made its way into the system cache and now must try and escape before they are found and destroyed by the system's antivirus and OS!

This game was created by the talented studio known as The Midnight Crew.

All code is sourced on Github here!
